Original:
”不期不待沒有傷害”
位於北車附近的新女僕餐廳，是伊立斯女僕的嘗試性分店，抱著分店的標準與期待踏進店裡，但整體體驗可謂非常糟糕。

-----
餐前先去找洗手間，轉角第一個能見的是小便斗非常的怪異（沒有拍圖片），雖然有簾子遮擋但女生會感受到十分不舒服吧？
再來才轉進去廁所環境，走進去大小兩隻蟑螂，大的跑了小的還在地上掙扎，地板與馬桶積水，完全沒有上廁所的慾望，連掀起蓋子都沒有勇氣，我是十二點半來到伊立斯的，我想單純客人應該很難半小時內髒到如此吧？重點與女僕反應後也未能得到改善。

回到座位環視，客人約一半了沒有全場照片，但從座位照即可知道位置有多小，卻幾乎塞滿著各種座位，我是坐在舞台旁的兩人桌，以手丈量單人桌約40×45cm，長桌是高腳椅若坐滿的話一個人位置約35cm，不禁讓我想起幼兒時在使用兒童座椅的經驗，十分的不舒適加上略嫌昏暗的燈光完全快樂不起來。

用餐前餐具如圖不曉得是髒污還是水漬，有請求更換一副餐具但一樣的情況，女僕說明是水漬後我表示沒關係明白了，衛生分數扣到負分。

因為是試驗性的店菜單主餐只有漢堡，建議店家還是給手套更好，想要不沾手的客人要放到袋子前卻要使用手（或者是我沒有使用正確的方法）總覺得哪裡很奇怪？
建議各位還是點低銷就好了，主餐沒有不好吃，十分的平淡沒有記憶點，隔壁店家的漢堡更便宜更好吃更大份，如果要點餐建議點奶油濃湯麵包盅，其他同性質餐廳沒有的，也剛好過低銷又有麵包可以吃，CP值很高。

女僕的互動非常迷，今日點的三樣餐點都是女僕推薦，第一個來互動的女僕開口卻是「你很餓嗎？吃這麼多」我知道他沒有惡意，但心裡卻不太舒服，其他女僕的互動也很迷，一個話題甚至一句話還沒說完就突然去忙或是去別的桌次聊天，可能我對鈴聲不敏感不知道有要送餐之類要去忙的，但直接結束或是轉身離去未告知很不禮貌且不舒服。

----

用餐時間九十分鐘，我待不到一半的時間就想走了，整體體驗沒有任何值得誇讚的地方，最多就是週邊裝潢還算完整算是優秀的吧，也許是抱著”因為是分店所以抱有高期待”這種想法讓我失望感成倍數增加，網上評價漢堡非常美味卻沒有隔壁幾家的好且更貴，收了服務費卻只得到滿身的不舒服與失望，除非信仰不然不推薦各位來訪。

無論如何都是試驗性質的快閃店，希望這些微小的意見能夠讓你們看見。
EN:
"Not waiting without harm"
The new maid restaurant near the north car is the trial branch of the Yilius maid. She holds the standards of the branch and expects to step into the store, but the overall experience can be described as very bad.

------
Go to the toilet before the meal. The first thing that can be seen in the corner is very weird (no picture). Although there are curtains, the girls will feel very uncomfortable?
Then I turned into the toilet environment, walked into the two cockroaches of the size, and ran the small one to struggle on the ground. Half to Ilis, I think it should be difficult for pure guests to be in order for half an hour, right?The focus has not been improved after responding to the maid.

Back to the seat and surrounding, about half the guests did not have a picture of the audience, but from the seat photo, you can know how small the location is, but almost full of various seats. The human table is about 40 × 45cm. If the long table is full of high chairs, if you are full, a person's location is about 35cm. I do n’t know whether it is dirty or water stains as shown in the picture before the meal. There is a request to replace a pair of tableware but the same situation. The maid explains that it is water stains. I said it does n’t matter. The sanitary score is deducted to the negative score.

Because it is a trial -based shop menu, the main meal is only burgers. It is recommended that the store still gives gloves better. Guests who want to not touch their hands have to use my hands (or I have no use method). Intersection
It is recommended that you order low sales. The main meal is not bad. It is very plain and there is no memory point. The burger of the store next door is cheaper and delicious. If you want to order, it is recommended to order cream soup noodle cup. There is no in nature restaurant, it is just low and there are bread to eat, and the CP value is very high.

The maid's interaction is very fascinating. The three meals today are recommended by the maid. The first maid to interact with is "Are you hungry? A topic or even a word suddenly goes to busy or go to another table to chat. Maybe I do n’t know the ringtone. I do n’t know if there is a food delivery. But it is impolite and uncomfortable to end directly or turn away.

---

The meal time was ninety minutes, and I wanted to leave in less than half of my time. There was no place to praise the overall experience. At most, the peripheral decoration was completely excellent, maybe it was holding it. " The idea of ​​high expectations made me disappointed and increased. The online evaluation of Hamburg is very delicious but not as good and more expensive next door. The service fee has only been full of discomfort and disappointment. Everyone visits.

Anyway, it is a test -based flash shop. I hope these tiny opinions will make you see.

Original:
我是稍早評論的同行友人
看到店家的回應著實令我傻眼

店家洋洋灑灑列了一堆女僕的名稱說有跟我們互動，但其中只有蜜璃、露亞兩位用心的女僕是主動來互動的，其餘的皆是為了來畫盤而不得不來互動的，而四位畫盤女僕的用心程度各位也可以從下圖看出，櫻花是裡面最用心的女僕。

我們很謝謝那些用心努力要給我們良好體驗的女僕們，但身為以「和女僕互動」為賣點的女僕咖啡廳應有的服務品質應該是讓客人有「歸宅」、「被女僕治癒」等效果吧。如同前一篇評論所述，名為天使的女僕工作時沒有面帶笑容，且語氣差的催促我們結帳，在根本未被告知結帳方式的狀況下，當然會覺得不舒服。而名為姬路的女僕繪盤隨意（圖中他畫的是美樂蒂不曉得大家看不看的出來☺️），體感畫不到30秒便完成，繪畫過程中不但沒有互動，畫完更是丟下一句「那一起施魔法」便走人。請問貴店身為女僕咖啡廳主打的特色何在？

如果不想好好給予女僕咖啡廳應有的服務，只想穿著女僕服賣拍立得，大可不要打著女僕咖啡廳的名號做生意。

Original:
2024 年來過兩次，第一次是在普通女僕裝期間，第二次是在特別活動浴衣服裝週期間。

位於二樓，設有電梯。然而，電梯相當老舊。女僕咖啡廳有廁所，還算乾淨。

這是一家女僕咖啡廳，食物確實不錯。麻婆馬鈴薯煎蛋飯是一定要嚐嚐的。訂購了兩次訪問，因為它很好。其他的鹹味食物都高於大多數女僕咖啡廳的平均水平。甜點很一般。蛋糕隨機發放，無法選擇口味。飲料還不錯，大部分都是甜的。

最低消費必須為 1 份雞尾酒或 1 份主菜（含飲料）。所有訂單均透過移動訂單完成。用餐時間只有1小時，請注意，您需要提前20分鐘預訂與女傭的合照或拍立得。否則您需要添加另一個訂單才能停留超過 1 小時。與其他女僕咖啡廳相比，價格較貴，但食物品質和服務更好。

餐點不包括與女傭的合照或拍立得。如果您想帶一些東西回家，則需要另外訂購。每張與 1 位女傭的照片為 TWD 300，可以是數位照片（手機）或透過拍立得照片。他們不限制帶女傭的客人人數，而是以每張照片的女傭人數收費。  例如：3人1女傭仍為TWD 300。

女僕品質一流，服裝訂製且細緻。他們的頭飾和化妝都很到位。女傭像朋友一樣和你交談，大部分談話時間都分配在上菜前。送餐後，他們需要一段時間才能再次回到您身邊。他們能夠很好地保持目光接觸。

大多數女傭只會說普通話。有些女傭會跳舞或唱歌，特別表演需收費，每場300元台幣。並非所有女傭都能表演，因此需要事先詢問。

這裡有女僕親手拍攝的拍立得照片牆供您購買。還有可以隨機取得的女僕卡扭蛋。大多數照片都非常暴露和性感。

環境乾淨，以女性為主。它很可愛，有很多拍照點，還有額外的心形照明，您可以藉用。主要以粉紅色和花朵裝飾。

兩次訪問都給我留下了很好的體驗，肯定會再次訪問。 💖
EN:
Two times in 2024, the first time was during the ordinary maid dress, and the second was during the special event bathrobe clothing week.

Located on the second floor, there is an elevator.However, the elevator is quite old.There is a toilet in the maid cafe, which is quite clean.

This is a maid cafe, and the food is really good.Mako potato fried egg rice must be tasted.I ordered two visits because it was very good.Other salty foods are higher than the average level of most maid cafes.Dessert is very average.The cake is randomly distributed and the taste cannot be selected.The drinks are not bad, most of them are sweet.

The minimum consumption must be 1 cocktail or 1 main course (including drinks).All orders are completed through mobile orders.The meal time is only 1 hour. Please note that you need to book a photo or take a photo or take a photo with your maid 20 minutes in advance.Otherwise you need to add another order to stay for more than 1 hour.Compared with other maid cafes, the price is more expensive, but food quality and service are better.

The meal does not include a photo or taking a photo with the maid.If you want to bring something home, you need to order separately.Each photo with 1 maid is TWD 300, which can be a digital photo (mobile phone) or the photo is taken through.They do not limit the number of guests with maids, but charges the number of maids in each photo.For example: 3 people and 1 maid are still TWD 300.

The maid's quality is first -class, and the clothing is customized and meticulous.Their headdress and makeup are in place.The maid talks to you like a friend, and most of the conversation time is allocated in front of the food.After delivery, they need a period of time to return to you again.They can keep their attention well.

Most maids can only speak Mandarin.Some maids will dance or sing, and special performances need to be charged, 300 yuan per game.Not all maids can perform, so they need to ask in advance.

Here are the maids taken to take a picture wall for you to buy.There is also a maid card Gacha that can be obtained randomly.Most photos are very exposed and sexy.

The environment is clean, mainly women.It is very cute, there are many photo points, and there are additional heart -shaped lighting, you can borrow it.Mainly decorated with pink and flowers.

I left me a good experience twice, and I will definitely visit again.Bleak
